summary: 5 HK cops (4 horny males) on vacation in Pattaya, Thailand, are told to contact an informant there but he gets murdered. They return to Hong Kong to contact his girlfriend and protect her. 3 other colleagues are busy fighting criminals.
cast: Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Richard Ng|Eric Tsang|Kiu Wai Miu|Stanley Sui-Fan Fung|Sibelle Hu|John Sham|Rosamund Kwan|Jackie Chan|Biao Yuen|Fat Chung|Yasuaki Kurata|Richard Norton|Andy Lau|Wu Ma|Melvin Wong|Kara Wai|Season Ma|Sandra Kwan Yue Ng|Ha Ping Ng|Billy Lau|Michelle Yeoh|Jaime Mei Chun Chik|Charlie Chin|Anthony Chan|Tat-Wah Tso|Ching Po Chang|James Tien|Chikara Hashimoto|Fruit Chan|Jason Piao Pai|Yau Cheung Yeung|San Tai|Hoi Sang Lee|Yun-Chiang Peng|Kar Lok Chin|Mo Yuen|Dick Wei|Phillip Ko|Hsueh-Ming Liao|Chia-Yung Liu|Yun-Kin Chow|Tau Chu|Fat Wan|Ha Huang|Keung-Kuen Lai|Chau Sang Lau|Chi Kit Lee|Pak-Cheung Chan|Philip Chan|Alfred Cheung|David Chiang|Winnie Chien|Siu-Ho Chin|Kenny Ho|George Lam|Wai Lam|Tina Lau|Moon Lee|Ka-Yan Leung|Hoi Mang|Tai-Bo|Jing Wong|Siu-Fung Wong|Cher Yeung|Deannie Ip|Kin-sang Lee|Yun-Ok Jo|Wing-Tat Woo|Simon Broad|John Culkin|Matthew Oram
title: El regreso de los supercamorristas
